They thought that the museum shop was the museum, said Zahi Hawass , Egypt's top archaeologist. ''These people are ignorant, they are outlaws.'' Nine looters climbed the fire escape to the museum roof and lowered themselves on ropes from a glass pane

In a statement posted at the center of Chrysler's home page Saturday, Sergio Marchionne said he regrets a term he used and considers it ''inappropriate.'' Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, Sergio Marchionne 's statement said. ''I regret the remark, which I consider inappropriate.'' Sergio Marchionne said Chrysler remains grateful for the bailouts and noted that no other parties were willing to assist in Chrysler's recovery.

judicial review into the police handling of the investigation. The Times investigation cited several former NoW journalists stating that Andy Coulson had ''actively encouraged'' phone hacking. ''In fact'', the newspaper continued, an examination based on police records, court documents and interviews with investigators and reporters shows that Britain's revered police agency failed to pursue leads suggesting that one of the country's most powerful newspapers was routinely listening in on its citizens. This was followed by a Channel 4 ''Dispatches'' programme, in which it was alleged that Andy Coulson had personally listened to hacked messages. Look, you adapt over the years, he replied. ''I started to cringe when I started to see people being booked as the so-called mean judge and just being gratuitously rude for the sake of it.
